rooms.description: Spacious open living area with Bohemian decor, natural light and abundant indoor greenery; includes seating area, coffee table, and eclectic furnishings.
Cozy dining space adjacent to the kitchen; decorated with vibrant colors and patterns in line with Bohemian aesthetic.
Modern yet functional kitchen with an island counter and ample storage, integrating both modern appliances and traditional elements.
Master bedroom with a private balcony facing east to ensure positive Vastu flow; furnished with Bohemian style decor including soft textures and warm colors.
Secondary bedroom designed with ample storage space and a small seating area, decorated in a relaxed Bohemian theme.
Additional bedroom, incorporating Vastu principles by orienting the bed towards the north-west to enhance positive energy flow; features light pastel colors.
Fourth bedroom, functional space with minimal decor and natural materials complementing the Bohemian vibe; designed for guest use or workspace.
Fifth bedroom, versatile space that can serve as an office or recreational room; integrates storage solutions with a relaxed Bohemian aesthetic.
Sixth bedroom, designed for children or servants with practical layout and Vastu-compliant orientation ensuring tranquility.
Primary bathroom adjacent to master bedroom; incorporates modern fixtures with Bohemian tile patterns and natural finishes.
Secondary bathroom serving the remaining bedrooms, designed with water-efficient fixtures and Vastu principles by placing taps towards the north.
Integrated closet area accessible from living spaces; features open shelving and space for eclectic decor items following Bohemian style.
Compact utility room for laundry and storage of cleaning supplies; designed with Vastu guidelines ensuring placement away from main living areas.

openings.description: Grand entryway with a decorative facade in line with Bohemian design; incorporates natural stone and reclaimed wood.
Large windows that let in ample natural light and fresh air while maintaining energy balance as per Vastu principles.
Interior doors with traditional wooden finishes and Bohemian details; ensure smooth flow between rooms.
